title: Flat for Land for sale @ Panadura City Limit
details:
Flat for Land for sale @ Panadura City Limit

• - Extent of land: 64 perches (rectangle land)

• - Road frontage: Over 100 feet

• - 20 Feet Wide Access Road

• - right-round parapet walls

• - highly residential & quiet neighborhood

• - The property is ideal for residential / Apartment Complex / Office / Warehouse / or any suitable for commercial purposes as well

• - Having water & electricity supplies

• - 50m to Galle road (4th block)

• - There is an option for buying this land separately in 20 or 44 perches.

1.3 million - 13 Laks -per perch (Negotiable)
